{"blocks":[{"key":"6a530","text":"Wash the column with 5 CV (CV, 20 mL) of Lysis buffer and collect eluted fractions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sdmd","text":"Analyze flow though fractions by SDS-PAGE and Coomassie blue staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22ndc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d0r37","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78elv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8dh8h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":156,"id":440380,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"6r17q\",\"text\":\"Ni-NTA chromatogram and SDS PAGE analysis.  TEV digest: 10 ÂµL sample + 10 ÂµL 2x SDS sample buffer, loaded 2.0 ÂµL. Fractions of interest: 10 ÂµL sample + 10 ÂµL 2x SDS sample buffer, loaded 5 ÂµL. Green boxes: Collected flow through (Fractions 20-21, 16 mL), and uncleaved His7-TEV-RAP protein eluted from the Ni-NTA column (Fractions 33-34).\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[{\"style\":\"bold\",\"offset\":0,\"length\":43}],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pqb8bixhp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pqb6bixhp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pqb7bixhp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pqb5bixhp.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eo812","text":"Some uncleaved His7-TEV-RAP protein may be eluted from the Ni-NTA column. Those fractions can be pooled, desalted and TEV digested again.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
